1.1.25  3:48 am   I have songs that I wrote several years ago, I still like how they sound but I have changed a lot since then and I don't relate to the messages of those songs anymore. I'm struggling with the idea of still playing them. So I was wondering if you relate to this with any of your old songs? And if so, do you think about reworking the lyrics/message of them while keeping the instrumental? Or do you feel like the whole song is from a moment in time from that part of your life and the lyrics and instrumental are intrinsically linked?
